columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the elastic pool.

columns.name: server_name
columns.description: The name of the parent server of the elastic pool.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a elastic pool uniquely.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the elastic pool.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the elastic pool.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The creation date of the elastic pool.

columns.name: database_dtu_max
columns.description: The maximum DTU any one database can consume.

columns.name: database_dtu_min
columns.description: The minimum DTU all databases are guaranteed.

columns.name: dtu
columns.description: The total shared DTU for the database elastic pool.

columns.name: edition
columns.description: The edition of the elastic pool.

columns.name: storage_mb
columns.description: Storage limit for the database elastic pool in MB.

columns.name: zone_redundant
columns.description: Whether or not this database elastic pool is zone redundant, which means the replicas of this database will be spread across multiple availability zones.
